channel.title: Newsdesk on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Newsdesk on MillMint

item.title: About
item.description: ‚ùñ For common questions about me or my work, please visit the FAQ. Hi, I’m Hobart. I’m an Australian illustrator and writer living and working in Tasmania. I like machines, midcentury architecture and Tasmania. I studied as a journalist, but now work in illustration full-time. I’m currently trying to learn how to cook. I walk most afternoons around my home town, which inspires a lot of how Vekllei looks and feels.
